title.value: Risk-Aware Bid Optimization for Online Display Advertisement
title.justification: The paper's title is clearly stated at the beginning.
title.quote: Risk-Aware Bid Optimization for Online Display Advertisement

extractions.description: This paper focuses on the bid optimization problem in the real-time bidding setting for online display advertisements. The authors propose a risk-aware data-driven bid optimization model that maximizes the expected profit for the advertiser, accounting for the risk of violating the budget constraint during a given period of time. They demonstrate their model\'s effectiveness on a real-world dataset, showing that it can effectively control the risk of overspending the budget while achieving a competitive level of profit.

type.justification: The paper emphasizes data-driven methods and presents experimental results based on a real-world dataset, indicating its empirical nature.
type.quote: Using a real-world dataset, we demonstrate that our risk-averse method can effectively control the risk of overspending the budget while achieving a competitive level of profit compared with the risk-neutral model and a state-of-the-art data-driven risk-aware bidding approach.
